backend/main.mo: Main actor for the Noventra.Ai backend, implementing session management (create, list, get, delete), message/file storage per session, and user profile CRUD with role-based access control via AccessControl mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Defines shared data types (SessionData, Message, FileData) and a no-op migration function that passes actor state through unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two high-confidence features (full app rebuild and dark theme preservation) to their relevant frontend files and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short descriptions for each frontend source file, serving as a reference summary of every component, page, hook, and service in the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file defining Noventra.Ai's dark theme with OKLCH color tokens, Space Grotesk/Inter/JetBrains Mono font imports, glassmorphism utilities, glow effects, and animation keyframes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with Home, Sessions, NewSession, and Chat routes, wraps the app in QueryClientProvider and ThemeProvider, and renders the ProfileSetup modal globally.
frontend/src/components/CodeBlock.tsx: Renders a Mac-style terminal code block with traffic-light chrome, filename/language label, JetBrains Mono syntax display, and a clipboard copy button.
frontend/src/components/LivePreview.tsx: Iframe-based live HTML preview component with desktop/tablet/mobile viewport controls, a refresh button, and an open-in-new-tab action.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A React button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout, supporting both compact and full display modes with loading states.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders a chat message bubble for user or assistant roles, parsing content into text and code block segments with optional HTML live preview.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A modal component that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, saving it via the backend mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile, sessions, messages, and file operations using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines the global dark theme using OKLCH CSS variables, Tailwind imports, and reusable component classes like glassmorphism, gradient text, glow effects, and buttons for the Noventra.Ai app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat interface page for a session that handles sending messages, generating AI responses, persisting messages to the backend, and displaying a live HTML preview tab.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Marketing landing page for Noventra.Ai featuring a hero section, feature highlights, stats, and login/navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/NewSessionPage.tsx: Form page for creating a new AI session, allowing users to enter a project name and select a project type before navigating to the chat.
frontend/src/pages/SessionsPage.tsx: Dashboard page that lists all user sessions with project type icons, relative timestamps, and the ability to delete or open sessions.
frontend/src/services/llmService.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for AI-generated files and responses, and provides scaffold-building functions that generate HTML/CSS landing page boilerplate based on project type and name.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and cleaning URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, using sessionStorage for cross-navigation persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark-themed design system with OKLCH color tokens, custom typography (Inter, Space Grotesk, JetBrains Mono), glow box shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks the Noventra AI project's state including version, architectural notes about ICP canister deployment issues, known bugs, and existing features for a landing page generator app with chat and live preview.
